page.title: 05ECOLOGY STRACATHRO
page.content:
{ Due recognition is paid to {conservation}in the area and the landowners in general, are scrupulous in their{preservation of amenities. Hard-wood tree and shrub planting is going on all the time, and there is a {very high standard of maintenance}by the farmers of their buildings, fields and hedges.
A local syndicate{rears}1500 game birds p.a.,pheasant,partridge and woodcock,of which about 1000 are shot This same syndicate shoots rabbits and hares over the estate. A foreign syndicate has{roe-deer {stalking rights}over part of the area. Another group has{fishing rights}on the North Esk and West Water, and about 60 salmon per annum are caught as well as trout. Thus{control is kept on the maintenance of stock numbers.
